title: All 32 - New York Giants: Daniel Jones development and learning more about Joe Judge with Matt Lombardo (Football 6/3)
description:
Throughout the year, we make the promise to cover all 32 NFL teams and that's especially true this June, as we are whipping around the league and connecting with a guest to discuss each team. This episode features Matt Lombardo of NJ Advance Media to talk about the New York Giants. Matt joins host Will Brinson to analyze Daniel Jones' development (1:00), explain who Joe Judge really is (8:15) and anticipate possible position battles (11:15), before setting 2020 expectations (16:45).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @MattLombardoNFL
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: Does everything in New York depend on the development of Daniel Jones? Matt Lombardo from NJ Advance Media helps us catch up on the Giants and their outlook for 2020.
